dc_title_s: Bartholomew's "half-inch to mile" map of England and Wales
dc_description_s: Relief shown by contours, gradient tints, and spot heights; depths shown by gradient tints.; In lower left margin: The Edinburgh Geographical Institute.; In lower center margin: Roads revised by the Cyclist's Touring Club.; "Reduced by permission from the new revised Ordnance Survey, with special local revision and correction to date of publication."|on sheets 68 x 85 centimeters or smaller|Scale 1:126,720; 2 miles = 1 inch|General Map Collection
